command.description: The operation to perform: "run" to spawn a subagent (default), "refresh" to re-scan the .letta/agents/ directories and update the available subagents list

subagent_type.description: The type of specialized agent to use. Available agents are discovered from .letta/agents/ directory. Required for "run" command.

prompt.description: The task for the agent to perform. Required for "run" command.

description.description: A short (3-5 word) description of the task. Required for "run" command.

model.description: Optional model to use for this agent. If not specified, uses the recommended model for the subagent type.
